entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:53 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 9.
